meanings: [명사] imagination, (공상) (literary) fancy, [동사] imagine, picture, (literary) fancy, conceive

vlive.korean: 상상... In my imagination. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 소리모사의 달인(?) 🍑정재현🍑 (JAEHYUN mimicing some sounds)
대체로 상상보다는 경험에 더 의존하는 편? Rely more on experience, than imagination? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: Rely more on experience, than imagination?

vlive.korean: [난이도 상상상] - 뭐야 이건 - 가지? [High, high, high in the difficulty level] - What's this? - An eggplant? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
vlive.english: [High, high, high in the difficulty level] - What's this? - An eggplant?

vlive.korean: [이 충격 소식을 접한 baby 리액션 상상만 해도...] 슈화는 아직 모를걸요? [When I imagine SHUHUA's reaction] SHUHUA doesn't know about this. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [(G)I-DLE] 내 비밀번호는 sjsj486이야 수진수진 사랑해..🍒 (SOOJIN talking about tattoo on her hand)
vlive.english: [When I imagine SHUHUA's reaction] SHUHUA doesn't know about this.

vlive.korean: 상상도 못했어... to buy a chick. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나는 누구를 좋아하는 걸까 [연애미수] EP04

examples.korean: Try to visualize him as an old man. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그를 늙은 노인으로 상상해 보세요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Try to visualize him as an old man. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He called her the foulest names imaginable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀에게 상상할 수 있는 온갖 욕을 다 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He called her the foulest names imaginable. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was unthinkable that she could be dead. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 죽었을 수도 있다는 것은 상상도 할 수 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It was unthinkable that she could be dead. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Such an idea was scarcely thinkable ten years ago. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그런 생각은 10년 전에는 거의 상상도 할 수 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Such an idea was scarcely thinkable ten years ago. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The time has come to think the unthinkable. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 상상도 할 수 없는 일을 생각해[고려해] 보아야 할 시간이 다가왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The time has come to think the unthinkable. Add to Wordbook
